org.jetel.component

Class WrapperTL

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.component.WrapperTL

  • public class WrapperTL
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for executing code written in CloverETL transform language. Before executing it is necessary to call init() method (usually when calling init() function)
    Since:
    Dec 4, 2006

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
          throws ComponentNotReadyException
        This method parses source code written in CloverETL language and initializes CloverETL language executor. It has to be called before executing any function
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • execute

        public TLValue execute(java.lang.String functionName,
              DataRecord[] inputRecords,
              DataRecord[] outputRecords,
              TLValue[] data)
                throws JetelException
        This method executes function wriiten in CloverETL language
        Parameters:
        functionName - function name
        inputRecords - input records
        outputRecords - output records
        Returns:
        result of executing function
        Throws:
        JetelException

      • prepareFunctionExecution

        public int prepareFunctionExecution(java.lang.String functionName)
                             throws ComponentNotReadyException
        If there is expected that the function will be executed many times, it is possible to set this function as "default" for quicker execution
        Parameters:
        functionName - name of function, which will be executed many times
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • prepareOptionalFunctionExecution

        public int prepareOptionalFunctionExecution(java.lang.String functionName)
        Prepares an optional function for execution.
        Parameters:
        functionName - the name of the function to be prepared
        Returns:
        an integer identification of the function if declared, -1 otherwise
